div.p:
I have the honor to acknowledge your letter of the 16th inst,
M to M. Clarke, 16 April 1871. See also M. Clarke to M, 11 April 1871 (in this edition as 71-04-11c). to thank you for it, and to inform you in reply that the Committee gratefully accept your offer to lecture
M delivered his lecture, on 'Forest culture in its relation to industrial pursuits', on 22 June 1871. It was later published as B71.13.03. and will pay any reasonable expenses you may incur
